hedline.hl1: National Briefing | Northwest: Oregon: Punishment In Police Hazing

abstract.p: Portland, Ore, Police Chief Mark Kroeker says 20 past and present members of elite police unit will get letters of reprimand for inappropriate behavior at initiation ritual; city probed hazing in unit after female officer retired after complaining of sexual jokes (S)5

block.p: Members of an elite unit of the Portland Police Bureau will be disciplined for inappropriate behavior at an initiation ritual, Chief Mark Kroeker announced. The city began investigating hazing in the Special Emergency Reaction team last month when a female officer in the unit retired after complaining of sexual jokes. The chief would not give details of the behavior. Mayor Vera Katz called the activities ''unacceptable.'' Chief Kroeker said 20 past and present members of the unit would receive letters of reprimands.
